name: Sustainability Business Analyst Full Curriculum (EQF Level 6)
description: Full curriculum for Sustainability Business Analyst at EQF Level 6
program_learning_outcomes: Analyze complex sustainability challenges in digital environments using appropriate frameworks and methodologies
Design and develop digital solutions that incorporate sustainability principles and minimize environmental impact
Evaluate the sustainability performance of digital systems using appropriate metrics and assessment tools
Apply ethical reasoning to address sustainability dilemmas in digital transformation contexts
Collaborate effectively with multidisciplinary teams to implement sustainable digital initiatives
Apply advanced analytics to measure, monitor and improve sustainability performance of digital systems

modules.name: Advanced Sustainability Impact Assessment Methods
modules.description: Cutting-edge methodologies for sustainability impact measurement
learning_outcomes: Evaluate advanced methodologies for sustainability impact assessment.
Critically analyze the strengths and limitations of different impact measurement approaches.
Design innovative assessment frameworks for complex sustainability challenges.
